verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) — For better part of an hour , President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] square off one on one , alone but for a pair of translators . That 's raising concerns about the risk of holding such a monumental meeting with barely anyone to bear witness .
